      • book

        public boolean book(java.lang.String firstName,
                    java.lang.String lastName,
                    DateTime required,
                    int numPassengers)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Description: This method is used for booking the Car.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The first name of the user booking the Car.
        lastName - The last name of the user booking the Car.
        required - The date that the user booked the Car.
        numPassengers - The number of passengers that the user booked the Car.
        Returns:
        booked A boolean value representing if the Car can be booked.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - The exceptions required.

      • completeBooking

        public java.lang.String completeBooking(java.lang.String firstName,
                                        java.lang.String lastName,
                                        DateTime dateOfBooking,
                                        double kilometers)
        Description: This method completes a booking based on the name of the passenger and the booking date.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The first name of the user booking the Car.
        lastName - The last name of the user booking the Car.
        dateOfBooking - The date that the user booked the Car.
        kilometers - The distance travelled by the Car.
        Returns:
        A string representing a statement if the booking is found or not.
